description: Candidates will research and write an original thesis on a topic in communication relevant to their field of study. Students enrolling in the yearlong course commencing in semester 1 enrol in COMU7007 for two semesters. Students commencing in the yearlong course in semester 2 enrol in COMU7008 for two semesters. Students enrolling in the course as a semester offering enrol in COMU7009 for one semester.
